text:
Not Khans, But Beyonce Stole The Thunder With Her Sizzling Dance Moves At Isha Ambani's Bash
Not Khans, But Beyonce Stole The Thunder With Her Sizzling Dance Moves At Isha Ambani's Bash
From Lakshi Mittal to Hilary Clinton and the entire B-Town, Isha Ambani and Anand Piramal's pre-wedding bash witnessed the presence of all big stars. It was a star-studded affair. Everyone danced and had a blast seemingly at the Sangeet ceremony!
But the highlight of the event was Beyonce. The Queen Bey flew to India for a special-personal concert at the Ambani bash.
She donned a desi avatar for the grand event! The two of her stunning attires were designed by Indian designers Abu Jani - Sandeep Khosla and Falguni and Shane Peacock.
She sang, she danced and she twerked and turned the event into one of the biggest musical nights!
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
She also sang Crazy in Love for lovebirds Isha Ambani and Anand Piramal.
And after performing last night, she was spotted at the airport as she left Udaipur.
title: Not Khans, But Beyonce Stole The Thunder With Her Sizzling Dance Moves At Isha Ambani's Bash
description: From Lakshi Mittal to Hilary Clinton and the entire B-Town, Isha Ambani and Anand Piramal's pre-wedding bash witnessed the presence of all big stars. It was a star-studded affair. But the highlight of the event was Beyonce. The Queen Bey flew to India for a special-personal concert at the Amabani bash.
